Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Authorizes a veteran's close friend or family member who is reasonably familiar with such veteran's wishes to request that such veteran be buried in a state veterans' cemetery
Summary: Authorizes a veteran's close friend or family who is reasonably familiar with such veteran's wishes to request that such veteran be buried in a state veterans' cemetery.
LawCode: Add ยง27-a, Veterans' Services L; amd ยง4201, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law and the public health law, in relation to authorizing a veteran's close friend or family member who is reasonably familiar with such veteran's wishes to request that such veteran be buried in a veterans' cemetery
